name: @kindredgroup/pit-perf-test-app
description: The example of standalone performance testing app for node-1
author: kindredgroup

scripts.dev.start: set -o allexport && source .env && set +o allexport && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.dev.build-image: npm run build && source .env; docker build -t $REGISTRY_URL/$SERVICE_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG .
